summary: Allows you to conjure all the Dragon Priests you defeated.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small mod that let\'s you conjure the Dragon Priests you encounter on the Nordic ruins.

Where to get the spells:
They are in front of the world wall in Shalidor\'s Maze(see the image for details)

Installation:
Drop the .esp file on your Data folder and activate it via launcher or NMM.

Recommended mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15052]Apophysis Dragon Priest Masks[/url]
author: Epzaos
